column4: after I use grouping/tabbing of windows things get funny. When I start new apps they show up just blank, I see the window border but only black in the content area, but it still works, mouse cursor changes, I can click on things, just can't see anything.
It seems to only happen after I do grouping/tabbing, but I could be wrong.
you could ask in the #compiz-fusion channel of irc.freenode.net
